special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
Avarice is a 10th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 14; +6 to hit with spell attacks). She has the following wizard spells prepared:
- Cantrips (at will): fire bolt (see "Actions" below), mage hand, message, minor illusion, prestidigitation
- 1st level (4 slots): detect magic, mage armor, magic missile
- 2nd level (3 slots): flaming sphere, knock, scorching ray
- 3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, fireball, fly
- 4th level (3 slots): banishment, fire shield
- 5th level (2 slots): Bigby's hand, Rary's telepathic bond

special_abilities.name: Icy Doom
special_abilities.desc: When Avarice dies, her corpse freezes for 9 days, during which time it can't be thawed, harmed by fire, animated, or raised from the dead.

special_abilities.name: Special Equipment
special_abilities.desc: Avarice wields a staff of frost with 10 charges (see "Actions" below).

actions.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 11 (2d10) fire damage.
actions.name: Fire Bolt (Cantrip)

actions.description: While holding this staff, Avarice can expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it (spell save DC 14): cone of cold (5 charges), fog cloud (1 charge), ice storm (4 charges), or wall of ice (4 charges). The staff regains 1d6 + 4 charges daily at dawn. If its last charge is expended, roll a d20; on a 1, the staff turns to water and is destroyed.
actions.name: Staff of Frost

source.name: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

special_abilities.name: Charge
special_abilities.desc: If the moose moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with an antlers attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

special_abilities.name: Sure-Footed
special_abilities.desc: The moose has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

actions.description: The moose makes two attacks: one with its antlers and one with its hooves.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Antlers

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Hooves

source.name: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

special_abilities.name: Auril's Blessing (3/Day)
special_abilities.desc: When Bjornhild hits a creature with a weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 11 (2d10) cold damage.

actions.description: Bjornhild makes two melee attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (1d12 + 4) slashing damage, plus 11 (2d10) cold damage if Bjornhild uses Auril's Blessing.
actions.name: Greataxe

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack:,rw +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 11 (2d10) cold damage if Bjornhild uses Auril's Blessing.
actions.name: Spear

source.name: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

name: Brain in a Jar
subtitle: Small undead, unaligned
senses: blindsight 120 ft. (blind beyond this radius); see also "detect sentience" below
languages: the languages it knew in life

special_abilities.name: Detect Sentience
special_abilities.desc: The brain can sense the presence and location of any creature within 300 feet of it that has an Intelligence of 3 or higher, regardless of interposing barriers, unless the creature is protected by a mind blank spell.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The brain has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magic effects.

special_abilities.name: Unusual Nature
special_abilities.desc: The brain doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. 13 (3d8) necrotic damage, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of the brain's next turn. If the target is undead, it also has disadvantage on attack rolls against the brain until the end of the brain's next turn.
actions.name: Chill Touch (Cantrip)

actions.description: The brain magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 14 Intelligence saving throw or take 17 (3d8 + 4) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
actions.name: Mind Blast (Recharge 5-6)

source.name: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

special_abilities.name: Chardalyn Madness
special_abilities.desc: The berserker must roll a d6 at the start of each of its turns. On a 1, the berserker does nothing on its turn except speak to a nonexistent, evil master whom it has pledged to serve.

special_abilities.name: Reckless
special_abilities.desc: At the start of its turn, the berserker can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

actions.description: The berserker attacks three times with a melee weapon.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of its next turn.
actions.name: Chardalyn Flail

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack:,rw +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of its next turn.
actions.name: Chardalyn Javelin

source.name: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

name: Chardalyn Dragon
subtitle: Huge construct, chaotic evil
languages: the languages known by its creator

special_abilities.name: Immutable Form
special_abilities.desc: The dragon is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The dragon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Siege Monster
special_abilities.desc: The dragon deals double damage to objects and structures.

special_abilities.name: Unusual Nature
special_abilities.desc: The dragon doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep, and it gains no benefit from finishing a short or long rest.

actions.description: The dragon uses its Malevolent Presence. It then makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its tail. If the dragon isn't flying, it can also make one attack with its wings.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d6 + 7) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claw

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 18 (2d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Tail

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 12 (2d4 + 7) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Wings

actions.description: Any creature with an Intelligence of 4 or more that is within 30 feet of the dragon must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by it for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Malevolent Presence for the next 24 hours. A creature charmed in this way fixates on another creature or object that the dragon mentally chooses and must, on each of its turns, move as close as it can to that target and use its action to make a melee attack against it. If the dragon doesn't choose a target, the charmed creature can act normally on its turn.
actions.name: Malevolent Presence

actions.description: The dragon exhales a ray of radiant energy in a 120-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 31 (7d8) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Radiant Breath (Recharge 5-6)

source.name: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

special_abilities.name: Blinding Light
special_abilities.desc: The walker sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. As a bonus action, the walker can target one creature in its bright light that it can see and force it to succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the start of the walker's next turn.

special_abilities.name: Icy Doom
special_abilities.desc: Any creature killed by the walker freezes for 9 days, during which time it can't be thawed, harmed by fire, animated, or raised from the dead.

special_abilities.name: Unusual Nature
special_abilities.desc: The walker doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.description: The walker makes two attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) cold damage.
actions.name: Slam

actions.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +3 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. 25 (4d10 + 3) cold damage.
actions.name: Cold Ray

source.name: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

name: Demos Magen
subtitle: Medium construct, unaligned
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

special_abilities.name: Fiery End
special_abilities.desc: If the magen dies, its body disintegrates in a harmless burst of fire and smoke, leaving behind anything it was wearing or carrying.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The magen has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Unusual Nature
special_abilities.desc: The magen doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.description: The magen makes two melee attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage.
actions.name: Greatsword

actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Light Crossbow

source.name: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing
special_abilities.desc: The fox has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 1 piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

source.name: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting (Humanoid Form Only)
special_abilities.desc:
The druid is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 14; +6 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following druid spells prepared:
- Cantrips (at will): druidcraft, guidance, resistance
- 1st level (4 slots): animal friendship, fog cloud, speak with animals
- 2nd level (3 slots): animal messenger, moonbeam, pass without trace
- 3rd level (3 slots): conjure animals, sleet storm, wind wall
- 4th level (3 slots): hallucinatory terrain, ice storm
- 5th level (1 slot): awaken

actions.description: The druid makes two melee attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1) slashing damage plus 5 (2d4) cold damage.
actions.name: Ice Sickle (Humanoid Form Only)

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.
actions.name: Maul (Beast Form Only)

actions.description: The druid magically polymorphs into a beast form—fox, mountain goat, owl, or wolf—or back into its humanoid form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the beast form (the druid's choice). It reverts to its humanoid form when it dies. The druid's statistics are the same in each form, except where noted in this stat block.
actions.name: Change Shape

source.name: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

special_abilities.name: Unusual Nature
special_abilities.desc: The skeleton doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.description: The skeleton makes two greataxe attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 25 (3d12 + 6) slashing damage.
actions.name: Greataxe

actions.description: The skeleton targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or take 35 (10d6) cold damage and be paralyzed until the end of its next turn.
actions.name: Freezing Stare

source.name: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

name: Galvan Magen
subtitle: Medium construct, unaligned
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

special_abilities.name: Fiery End
special_abilities.desc: If the magen dies, its body disintegrates in a harmless burst of fire and smoke, leaving behind anything it was wearing or carrying.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The magen has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Unusual Nature
special_abilities.desc: The magen doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.description: The magen makes two Shocking Touch attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Spell Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target (the magen has advantage on the attack roll if the target is wearing armor made of metal). 7 (1d6 + 4) lightning damage.
actions.name: Shocking Touch

actions.description: The magen discharges a lightning bolt in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw (with disadvantage if the creature is wearing armor made of metal), taking 22 (4d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Static Discharge (Recharge 5-6)

source.name: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

special_abilities.name: Hold Breath
special_abilities.desc: The walrus can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

actions.description: The walrus makes two attacks: one with its body flop and one with its tusks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 15 (2d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Body Flop

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 16 (3d6 + 6) piercing damage.
actions.name: Tusks

source.name: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: The vampire has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

special_abilities.name: Rampage
special_abilities.desc: When it reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the vampire can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

special_abilities.name: Regeneration
special_abilities.desc: The vampire regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the vampire takes radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vampire's next turn.

special_abilities.name: Shapechanger
special_abilities.desc:
If the vampire isn't in sunlight, it can use its action to polymorph into a Large hyena or a Medium cloud of mist, or back into its true form.
While in hyena form, the vampire can't speak, and its walking speed is 50 feet. Its statistics, other than its size and speed, are unchanged. Anything it is wearing transforms with it, but nothing it is carrying does. It reverts to its true form if it dies.
While in mist form, the vampire can't take any actions, speak, or manipulate objects. it is weightless, has a flying speed of 20 feet, can hover, and can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. In addition, if air can pass through a space, the mist can do so without squeezing, and it can't pass through water. It has advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws, and it is immune to all nonmagical damage, except the damage it takes from sunlight.

special_abilities.name: Unusual Nature
special_abilities.desc: The vampire doesn't require air.

special_abilities.name: Vampire Weaknesses
special_abilities.desc: The vampire has the following flaws:

special_abilities.name: Enraged by Celestial
special_abilities.desc: If it hears words of Celestial spoken, the vampire must try to attack the source of those spoken words on its next turn. If these words come from multiple sources and from opposite directions, the vampire is restrained. Otherwise, it moves to attack what it perceives to be the closest source.

special_abilities.name: Repulsed by Perfume
special_abilities.desc: The vampire has disadvantage on melee attack rolls made against any creature wearing perfume or carrying an open container of it.

special_abilities.name: Stake to the Heart
special_abilities.desc: If a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into the vampire's heart while the vampire is incapacitated in its resting place, the vampire is paralyzed until the stake is removed.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
special_abilities.desc: The vampire takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

actions.description: The vampire makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.
actions.name: Multiattack (Vampire Form Only)

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. the target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.
actions.name: Bite (Hyena or Vampire Form Only)

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d4 + 5) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claws (Vampire Form Only)

actions.description: The vampire emits a bone-chilling cackle. Each creature of the vampire's choice that is within 120 feet of the vampire and can hear its cackle must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the vampire's Frightful Cackle for the next 24 hours.
actions.name: Frightful Cackle (Hyena or Vampire Form Only)

actions.description: The vampire targets one humanoid it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the vampire, the target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw against this magic or be poisoned for 24 hours. A creature whose saving throw is successful is immune to this vampire's Sickening Gaze for 24 hours.
actions.name: Sickening Gaze (Hyena or Vampire Form Only)

source.name: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

name: Gnome Ceremorph
subtitle: Small aberration, unaligned
languages: Deep Speech, Gnomish, telepathy 120 ft., Undercommon

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The ceremorph has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 15 (2d10 + 4) psychic damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 9) and must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw or be stunned until this grapple ends.
actions.name: Tentacles

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one incapacitated humanoid grappled by the ceremorph. 55 (10d10) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the ceremorph kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.
actions.name: Extract Brain

actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 40/120 ft., one target. 12 (3d6 + 2) radiant damage.
actions.name: Laser Pistol

actions.description: The ceremorph magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw or take 22 (4d8 + 4) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
actions.name: Mind Blast (Recharge 5-6)

source.name: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

name: Gnome Squidling
subtitle: Small aberration, unaligned
languages: understands Deep Speech and Gnomish but can't speak, telepathy 60 ft.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The squidling has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 5 (2d4) psychic damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 7) and must succeed on a DC 7 Intelligence saving throw or be stunned until this grapple ends.
actions.name: Tentacles

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one incapacitated creature grappled by the squidling. 27 (5d10) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the squidling kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.
actions.name: Extract Brain

actions.description: The squidling magically emits psychic energy in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 7 Intelligence saving throw or take 2 (1d4) psychic damage and be stunned until the end of its next turn.
actions.name: Mind Tickle (Recharge 5-6)

source.name: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

special_abilities.name: Mountain Born
special_abilities.desc: The goliath is acclimated to high altitude, including elevations above 20,000 feet.

special_abilities.name: Powerful Build
special_abilities.desc: The goliath counts as one size larger when determining its carrying capacity and the weight it can push, drag, or lift.

actions.description: The goliath makes two attacks with its greataxe or hurls two javelins.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (1d12 + 4) slashing damage.
actions.name: Greataxe

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack:,rw +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Javelin

source.name: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

name: Goliath Werebear
subtitle: Medium humanoid(goliath shapechanger), neutral good

damage_immunities.index: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered
damage_immunities.name: *from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

languages: Common, Giant (can't speak in bear form)

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: The werebear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

special_abilities.name: Mountain Born
special_abilities.desc: The werebear is acclimated to high altitude, including elevations above 20,000 feet.

special_abilities.name: Powerful Build (Humanoid Form Only)
special_abilities.desc: The werebear counts as one size larger when determining its carrying capacity and the weight it can push, drag, or lift.

special_abilities.name: Shapechanger
special_abilities.desc: The werebear can use its action to polymorph into a Large bear-humanoid hybrid or into a Large polar bear, or back into its goliath form. Its statistics, other than its size and AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

actions.description: The werebear makes two melee attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with werebear lycanthropy, as described in the Monster Manual.
actions.name: Bite (Bear or Hybrid Form Only)

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claw (Bear or Hybrid Form Only)

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (1d12 + 5) slashing damage.
actions.name: Greataxe (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)

source.name: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

special_abilities.name: Duergar Resilience
special_abilities.desc: Grandolpha has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells, and illusions, as well as to resist being charmed or paralyzed.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: While in sunlight, Grandolpha has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.description: Grandolpha extends her hand toward a creature she can see within 10 feet of her and projects a puff of noxious gas from her palm. The creature must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or take 13 (2d12) poison damage.
actions.name: Poison Spray (Cantrip)

source.name: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

special_abilities.name: Escape
special_abilities.desc: The hare can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

source.name: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

name: Hypnos Magen
subtitle: Medium construct, unaligned
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak, telepathy 30 ft.

special_abilities.name: Fiery End
special_abilities.desc: If the magen dies, its body disintegrates in a harmless burst of fire and smoke, leaving behind anything it was wearing or carrying.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The magen has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Unusual Nature
special_abilities.desc: The magen doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.description: The magen's eyes glow silver as it targets one creature that it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or take 11 (2d10) psychic damage.
actions.name: Psychic Lash

actions.description: The magen casts the suggestion spell (save DC 12), requiring no material components. The target must be a creature that the magen can communicate with telepathically. If it succeeds on its saving throw, the target is immune to this magen's suggestion spell for the next 24 hours. The magen's spellcasting ability is Intelligence.
actions.name: Suggestion

source.name: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

special_abilities.name: Cold Aura
special_abilities.desc: While it's alive, the troll generates an aura of bitter cold that fills the area within 10 feet of it. At the start of the troll's turn, all nonmagical flames in the aura are extinguished. Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the troll takes 10 (3d6) cold damage.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: The ice troll has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

special_abilities.name: Regeneration
special_abilities.desc: The ice troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The ice troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.description: The troll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) cold damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) cold damage. If the target takes any of the cold damage, the target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or have disadvantage on its attack rolls until the end of its next turn.
actions.name: Claw

source.name: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
special_abilities.desc: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack:,rw +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Dagger

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack:,rw +0 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 1 (1d6 - 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Javelin

source.name: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
The fanatic is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 11, +3 to hit with spell attacks). The fanatic has the following cleric spells prepared:
- Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy
- 1st level (4 slots): command, inflict wounds, shield of faith
- 2nd level (3 slots): hold person, spiritual weapon

special_abilities.name: Dark Devotion
special_abilities.desc: The fanatic has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

actions.description: The fanatic makes two melee attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack:,rw +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one creature. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Dagger

source.name: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

special_abilities.name: Hold Breath
special_abilities.desc: Kingsport can hold its breath for 20 minutes.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.
actions.name: Beak

source.name: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

special_abilities.name: Water Breathing
special_abilities.desc: The trout can breathe only underwater.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Tail

source.name: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The vampire has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the vampire's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

special_abilities.name: Regeneration
special_abilities.desc: The vampire regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the vampire takes radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Unusual Nature
special_abilities.desc: The vampire doesn't require air.

special_abilities.name: Vampire Weaknesses
special_abilities.desc: The vampire has the following flaws:

special_abilities.name: Forbiddance
special_abilities.desc: The vampire can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.

special_abilities.name: Harmed by Running Water
special_abilities.desc: The vampire takes 20 acid damage when it starts its turn in running water.

special_abilities.name: Stake to the Heart
special_abilities.desc: The vampire is destroyed if a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into its heart while it is incapacitated in its resting place.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
special_abilities.desc: The vampire takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage plus 5 (2d4) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.
actions.name: Bite

source.name: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The living spell has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Unfettered
special_abilities.desc: The living spell can move through any barrier, even a wall of magical force.

special_abilities.name: Unusual Nature
special_abilities.desc: The living spell doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.description: Melee Spell Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 26 (4d12) force damage, unless the living spell rolled an 18 or higher on the d20 for the attack, in which case the attack is a critical hit that deals 78 (12d12) force damage instead.
actions.name: Force Blade

source.name: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

special_abilities.name: Dimensional Form
special_abilities.desc: The living spell can enter another creature's space and vice versa, and it can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. The living spell can't detach from a solid surface, such as a wall, ceiling, or floor. If it has no surface to attach to, the living spell is destroyed (see "Planar Destruction" below).

special_abilities.name: Extradimensional Chamber
special_abilities.desc: When the living spell enters another creature's space (or vice versa) for the first time on a turn, the other creature must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw or be pulled into the living spell's extradimensional space, an unfurnished stone chamber 30 feet in every dimension. A creature too big to fit in this space succeeds on the saving throw automatically. Creatures in the chamber never run out of breathable air. Magic that enables transit between planes, such as plane shift, can be used to escape the chamber, which has no exits otherwise. Creatures trapped inside the extradimensional chamber can't see, target, or deal damage to the living spell; however, they can damage the room around them. Each 5-foot-square section of ceiling, wall, and floor in the chamber has AC 17, 50 hit points, immunity to poison and psychic damage, and immunity to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage that is nonmagical. If any section is reduced to 0 hit points, the living spell and its chamber are destroyed (see "Planar Destruction" below).

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The living spell has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Planar Destruction
special_abilities.desc: The living spell is destroyed when it or a 5-foot-square section of its extradimensional chamber is reduced to 0 hit points, or when the living spell has no surface to attach to. When the living spell is destroyed, the contents of its extradimensional chamber are expelled, appearing as close to the living spell's previous location as possible. Each expelled creature appears in a randomly determined unoccupied space, along with whatever it is wearing or carrying.

special_abilities.name: Unusual Nature
special_abilities.desc: The living spell doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

source.name: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

special_abilities.name: Detect Life
special_abilities.desc: The banshee can magically sense the presence of creatures up to 5 miles away that aren't undead or constructs. She knows the general direction they're in but not their exact locations.

special_abilities.name: Incorporeal Movement
special_abilities.desc: The banshee can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. She takes 5 (1d10) force damage if she ends her turn inside an object.

actions.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 12 (3d6 + 2) necrotic damage.
actions.name: Spectral Longbow

actions.description: Each non-undead creature within 60 feet of the banshee that can see her must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the banshee is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the banshee's Horrifying Visage for the next 24 hours.
actions.name: Horrifying Visage

actions.description: The banshee releases a mournful wail, provided that she isn't in sunlight. This wail has no effect on constructs and undead. All other creatures within 30 feet of her that can hear her must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, a creature drops to 0 hit points. On a success, a creature takes 10 (3d6) psychic damage.
actions.name: Wail (1/Day)

source.name: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

special_abilities.name: Charge
special_abilities.desc: If the goat moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

special_abilities.name: Sure-Footed
special_abilities.desc: The goat has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Ram

source.name: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
Prisoner 237 is a 5th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 13; +5 to hit with spell attacks). He has the following wizard spells prepared:
- Cantrips (at will): light*, message*, prestidigitation, shocking grasp (see "Actions" below)
- 1st level (4 slots): mage armor*, shield, sleep
- 2nd level (3 slots): arcane lock*, detect thoughts*, suggestion*
- 3rd level (2 slots): counterspell, lightning bolt*

actions.description: Melee Spell Attack: +5 to hit (with advantage on the attack if the target is wearing armor made of metal), reach 5 ft., one creature. 9 (2d8) lightning damage, and the target can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.
actions.name: Shocking Grasp (Cantrip)

source.name: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

special_abilities.name: Hold Breath
special_abilities.desc: The seal can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: The seal has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1 piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

source.name: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

special_abilities.name: Cold Regeneration
special_abilities.desc: If the temperature around him is 0 degrees Fahrenheit or lower, Sephek regains 5 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of Sephek's next turn. Sephek dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.description: Sephek attacks twice with a weapon.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if Sephek uses the weapon with two hands, plus 5 (2d4) cold damage.
actions.name: Ice Longsword

actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 5 (2d4) cold damage.
actions.name: Ice Dagger

source.name: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

special_abilities.name: Cold Absorption
special_abilities.desc: Whenever the golem is subjected to cold damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the cold damage dealt.

special_abilities.name: Immutable Form
special_abilities.desc: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

special_abilities.name: Melt
special_abilities.desc: While in an area of extreme heat, the golem loses 1d6 hit points at the start of each of its turns.

special_abilities.name: Unusual Nature
special_abilities.desc: The golem doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.description: The golem makes three melee attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) cold damage.
actions.name: Slam

actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. 9 (2d6 + 2) cold damage.
actions.name: Snowball

source.name: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

special_abilities.name: Keen Sight and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The snowy owlbear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

actions.description: The snowy owlbear makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage.
actions.name: Beak

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claws

source.name: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

special_abilities.name: Gnome Cunning
special_abilities.desc: Spellix has advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

actions.description: Melee Spell Attack: +5 to hit (with advantage on the attack roll if the target is wearing armor made of metal), reach 5 ft., one creature. 4 (1d8) lightning damage, and the target can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.
actions.name: Shocking Grasp (Cantrip)

actions.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 5 (1d10) fire damage. A flammable object hit by this spell ignites if it isn't being worn or carried.
actions.name: Fire Bolt (Cantrip)

source.name: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

special_abilities.name: Echolocation
special_abilities.desc: The whale can't use its blindsight while deafened.

special_abilities.name: Hold Breath
special_abilities.desc: The whale can hold its breath for 90 minutes.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing
special_abilities.desc: The whale has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

actions.description: The whale makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 21 (3d8 + 8) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the whale. A swallowed creature has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the whale, and it takes 3 (1d6) acid damage at the start of each of the whale's turns. If the whale takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the whale must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the whale. If the whale dies, a swallowed creature can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting prone.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 18 (3d6 + 8) bludgeoning damage, or 37 (6d6 + 16) bludgeoning damage if the target is an object.
actions.name: Tail

source.name: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

special_abilities.name: Shapechanger
special_abilities.desc: The mimic can use its action to polymorph into an object or back into its true, amorphous form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

special_abilities.name: Adhesive (Object Form Only)
special_abilities.desc: The mimic adheres to anything that touches it. A Huge or smaller creature adhered to the mimic is also grappled by it (escape DC 16). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance (Object Form Only)
special_abilities.desc: While the mimic remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary object.

special_abilities.name: Grappler
special_abilities.desc: The mimic has advantage on attack rolls against any creature grappled by it.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The mimic has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.description: The mimic attacks three times: twice with its pseudopods and once with its bite.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 10 (1d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the mimic is in object form, the target is subjected to its Adhesive trait.
actions.name: Pseudopods

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) acid damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: The mimic spits acid at one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 32 (9d6 + 1) acid damage on failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Spit Acid (Recharge 5-6)

source.name: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

name: Tomb Tapper
subtitle: Huge construct, lawful neutral
languages: understands Common and Undercommon but doesn't speak, telepathy 60 ft.

special_abilities.name: Petrified Death
special_abilities.desc: A tomb tapper reduced to 0 hit points turns into a lifeless stone statue. Anything it's wearing or carrying is not transformed.

special_abilities.name: Sense Magic
special_abilities.desc: The tomb tapper senses magic within 30 feet of it and can use an action to pinpoint the location of any creature, object, or area in that range that bears magic. This sense penetrates barriers but is blocked by a thin sheet of lead.

special_abilities.name: Tunneler
special_abilities.desc: The tomb tapper can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 10-foot-wide, 20-foot-tall tunnel in its wake.

special_abilities.name: Unusual Nature
special_abilities.desc: The tomb tapper doesn't require air or sleep.

actions.description: The tomb tapper makes two melee attacks with its sledgehammer or with its claws. If it hits the same creature with both claws, it can pull that creature within 5 feet of its mouth and make a bite attack against it.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 22 (3d10 + 6) slashing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 16 (3d6 + 6) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claw

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack:,rw +10 to hit, reach 15 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. 27 (6d6 + 6) bludgeoning or force damage (tomb tapper's choice). If thrown, the hammer returns to the tomb tapper at the end of its turn, landing at the tomb tapper's feet if it doesn't have a hand free to catch the weapon.
actions.name: Sledgehammer

source.name: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
Vellynne is an 8th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). She has the following wizard spells prepared:
- Cantrips (at will): chill touch (see "Actions" below), light, mage hand, message, prestidigitation
- 1st level (4 slots): comprehend languages, detect magic, ray of sickness, Tasha's hideous laughter
- 2nd level (3 slots): darkvision, hold person, ray of enfeeblement
- 3rd level (3 slots): animate dead, Leomund's tiny hut, vampiric touch (see "Actions" below)
- 4th level (2 slots): arcane eye, blight

special_abilities.name: Special Equipment
special_abilities.desc: Vellynne wears bracers of defense and carries a wand of magic missiles (see "Actions" below).

actions.description: Melee Spell Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 10 (3d6) necrotic damage, and Vellynne regains hit points equal to half the necrotic damage dealt. If Vellynne casts this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the necrotic damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 3rd.
actions.name: Vampiric Touch (3rd-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)

actions.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. 9 (2d8) necrotic damage, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of Vellynne's next turn.
actions.name: Chill Touch (Cantrip)

actions.description: While holding this wand, Vellynne can expend 1 or more of its 7 charges to cast the magic missile spell from it. She can expend 1 charge to cast the 1st-level version of the spell. She can increase the spell slot level by one for each additional charge she expends. The wand regains 1d6 + 1 expended charges daily at dawn. If the wand's last charge is expended, roll a d20; on a 1, the wand crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.
actions.name: Wand of Magic Missiles

source.name: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

special_abilities.name: Simple Weapon Wielder
special_abilities.desc: A simple weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the verbeeg hits with it (included in the attack).

actions.description: The verbeeg makes two melee attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack:,rw +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 14 (3d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 17 (3d8 + 4) piercing damage if used to make a ranged attack or used with two hands to make a melee attack.
actions.name: Spear

source.name: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden
